effect.twilightdelight.aurora_glowing.de: Marks affected entities with an outline glow with rainbow colors, allowing them to be seen through blocks.
Reduces movement speed and attack damage.
effect.twilightdelight.poison_range.desc: Grants immuntity to Poison and poisons nearby hostile entities.
effect.twilightdelight.frozen_range.desc: Grants immuntity to Frosted, inflicts Frosted on nearby hostile entities, and freezes nearby blocks.
effect.twilightdelight.fire_range.descri: Grants immuntity to fire and sets nearby hostile entities on fire.
